question: What is the length of Arc_A_O1?
description:
原始图形描述: Base shape is a regular 3-sided polygon (center O1) with side length 9, rotation angle pi/3 radians. Total 2 derivation rounds. Round 1: applying 'circum_inscribe' rule. Circumscribed circle (center O1) around 3-sided polygon. Round 2: applying 'translation' rule. Translation derivation: circle (new center O2) translated right. generated_question:
Two circles with centers O₁ and O₂ intersect at points A and C. A regular triangle ABC is inscribed in the circle centered at O₁, with side length 9. The circle centered at O₂ is obtained by translating the circle centered at O₁ to the right. Point B lies on the circumference of the circle centered at O₁. Segment AC is a common chord of both circles. Arc A–O₁ refers to the arc along the circumference of the circle centered at O₁, from point A to point O₁, passing through the interior of triangle ABC.

What is the length of Arc A–O₁?
